title: ICEYE to provide radar imaging satellite for BAE Systems’ new multi-sensor satellite constellation
key_assets: BAE Systems’ Azalea™ multi-sensor satellite cluster
summary: ICEYE is partnering with BAE Systems to provide advanced SAR technology for BAE Systems’ Azalea™ multi-sensor satellite constellation, which will launch in 2024. The constellation will combine SAR, optical, and RF data with on-board machine learning for real-time intelligence delivery. BAE Systems is also a strategic investor in ICEYE, having participated in its $136M Series D funding round earlier this year.
why_it_matters: This partnership strengthens the collaboration between ICEYE and BAE Systems, enhancing sovereign space capabilities for defense and commercial applications. It demonstrates the growing role of commercial SAR technology in meeting defense remote sensing requirements and highlights ICEYE’s leadership in persistent Earth monitoring.
